sub_title: Pursuing creativity in every form, and exceptional stories from every source
summary:
Being a professional musician over the past decade, as financially secure as it is, has been a singular experience for me. A plethora of skills that I've learnt out of necessity, from brand management to contract negotiation, has guided me through many difficult situations and out of many more failures.

The passion that grew from managing my own personal brand has led me to complete a diploma and degree in Marketing and Communications, in the hope that my prior experiences will be able to aid clients traversing the dangerous line between standing out and falling off.

Today I conceptualise, customise and create engaging and undeniably creative marketing, advertising and social media solutions for companies with a boutique advertising company. I also take on independent writing and branding projects for clients and editorials, like legit.sg and "Wood and Steel Gastrobar".

I also enjoy making connections on professional social networks. Reach out if you want to talk about advertising, music or spectacular hummus dip.


Specialities: Copywriting, Creative Conceptualisation, Event Management, Business Development, Creative Solutions, Presenting Ideas, Teaching

profile_positions.description:
The go-to vocal guy: That's me! When it came to prepping clients for a solid vocal performance or directing a session, I used my experience as a vocal educator to ensure the talent could perform at their best. I've also produced tracks and toplined with artists from around the world, including:

- Qamar Saleem (Pakistan)
- DJ Asumadu (Ghana)
-JAYEFUNK (Singapore)
- Killarci (Singapore)
- DJ MASS (Sri Lanka)
profile_positions.title: Vocal Producer and Topline Writer

profile_positions.description:
- Over 14-years experience performing across different genres ranging from jazz to rock, at
everything from regular bar gigs to large scale corporate events and festivals, with very current connections in the original music and cover music scene in Singapore

- Represented Singapore and performed at the 2019 BIGSOUND Music Festival & Conference, Australia's largest music industry festival

- Won government funding for, creative-directed, and project-managed "home.", a multi-disciplinary heritage project which revitalised a small neighbourhood facing redevelopment in 2022: www.hometanglinhalt.com

- Performed all over the world, from USA to India, from Australia to Indonesia.

- A recipient of the National Arts Council’s Presentation Grant with Hariz&Lincoln and their International Presentation Grant in representing Singapore for BIGSOUND 2019

- Currently a signed artist and songwriter to Cross Ratio Entertainment Pte Ltd, alongside label mates of the likes of Tay Kewei, Belinda Lee, Ling Kai and many others
profile_positions.title: Musician

profile_positions.description:
- Conceptualised and wrote copy for ads, scripts, and marketing materials across print, social media, direct marketing, radio, TV, and more for a range of clients on retainer, including Toyota, Lexus, Suzuki Häagen Dazs, Betty Crocker, and Fairprice

- Pitched for and won a range of projects across multiple industries, from TV ads to 360° marketing campaigns. These clients include Fonterra, Livspace, Unilever, and Mãe Terra

- Along with my Creative Director Kevin Geeves, we managed the rebrand of LionsBot Singapore, an award-winning robotics company. From writing all the pages in a complete website redesign to scripting and directing a series of films to producing brochures and ads for each of their products, I was solely responsible for creating their tone-of-voice and writing all the copy across the massive project
profile_positions.title: Copywriter

profile_positions.description:
Key Projects

•	CITY65 Music Festival 2018 (Creative Lead, Sponsor Liaison and Event Coordinator)

- Organised, curated and coordinated the second edition of Singapore’s only purely local music festival, encapsulating 2 stages with over ten acts and a full 10 hour program.
- Helped to source, pitch and manage sponsors for the festival, all while creating opportunities for sponsorship in high audience engagement activities.

•	The Music Parlour Pte Ltd (Event Creative and Curation Head)

- In charge of conceptualising, organising and executing events within tight budgets that boost overall sales volume, increase brand visibility and build communities.
- Created a unique brand voice on social media that has become an integral part of the brand’s identity, a part that consumers now recognize as synonymous with the brand.

•	Singapore River One (Event Curator)

- Organised and curated the Singapore River One’s “Street Lounge”, bringing songwriters and performers to stages along Circular Road and Boat Quay
- Curated a series of performances for the Singapore River Festival 2018, managing performers and logistics for 3 stages, from Boat Quay to Robertson Quay, over 2 weekends.
profile_positions.title: Freelance Copywriter and Event Creative

profile_positions.description:
•	Conceptualised and produced events for high-level clients like Samsung and Dassault Systèmes, handling every aspect from the design direction to the event activities while maintaining the brand’s unique identity throughout the event experience.

•	Pitched full proposals and wrote corporate and creative copy effectively, making a positive impact and lasting connections with potential clients.
profile_positions.title: Creative Executive

profile_positions.description:
•	Developed and taught curriculum for vocals, guitar, ukulele and bass for professionals while organising and overseeing private and public events aimed at improving company reputation and creating marketing content. 

•	Fostered good relations between company and local artistes by being an effective liaison, improving company profile and brand awareness.
profile_positions.title: Educator

profile_positions.description:
•	Worked closely with owners on the rebrand of the multi-venue concept, personally managed marketing efforts as well as the management and execution of the opening events for both the Santa Fe Tex Mex Grill and Wood & Steel Gastrobar.

•	Handled external event bookings with both consumer and corporate clients in their negotiation, planning and execution as well as conceptualised and organised events to encourage sales and build the brand further.
profile_positions.title: Marketing and Event Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Worked in B2B sales of product placements on the home renovation portal 1ClickRenoSG and designed marketing and sales peripherals to aid in sales efforts. 

•	Actively looked for innovative sales opportunities outside of the offered services that maximised effective use of assets with a positive effect on sales.
profile_positions.title: Sales & Marketing Executive
